g.title: tower_rotation
g.text: A button that rotates the tower

g.title: channelwood_access
g.text: Find secret room under the big tree

g.title: tower_aligned
g.text: Align the tower to receive clues

a.xlink:title: You can find the lever via dumb luck
If you never fail you don't need to reset

g.title: date_star_mapping
g.text: Use the spooky chair to get stars

g.title: clocktower_bridge_raised
g.text: Raise the bridge to the clock tower

g.title: clocktower_marker_switch
g.text: Enable the clock tower marker switch

g.title: learn_fireplace_page_number
g.text: tells you how to use the fireplace

g.title: mechanical_page_found
g.text: Find a page in a secret room

a.xlink:title: You can skip this via brute force or big brain

g.title: mechanical_code_2
g.text: Learn 2nd half of the exit code

g.title: mechanical_code_1
g.text: Learn 1st half of the exit code

g.title: stoneship_page_found
g.text: Find a page in the brothers' rooms

g.title: torn_paper_stoneship
g.text: Find half of a torn page

g.title: learn_marker_switch_secret
g.text: Learn the secret of the marker switches

g.title: windmill_manipulated
g.text: Get water flowing from the windmill

g.title: channelwood_second_level
g.text: Power the elevator to the second level

g.title: channelwood_exit_unlocked
g.text: Extend the pipe to power the exit elevator

g.title: channelwood_door_found
g.text: Use staircase door to bypass the elevator

g.title: torn_paper_channelwood
g.text: Find half of a torn page

g.title: channelwood_page_found
g.text: Find a page in the brothers' rooms
